topics.body:
!i.imgur.com/WcwmM9z.jpg!
"An extraordinary cave has lately been discovered near an upper branch of the Chippeway River, (District of Huron,) which constantly emits a current of gaseous air of such extreme offensive smell as to render it impossible for any man to enter. What is still more remarkable, dogs rush in with great avidity; but, as soon as they have entered; they set up a frightful howling and yelping; which gradually dies away in the distance till all is quiet. No dog is ever seen to return."
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54da5fbf6368721c43331000#post_54da5fbf6368721c43331000
I haven't watched it.
I watched the episode 25, and almost make me suffer a brain paralysis.

I want to watch the 26 and suffer for a coma after trying to figure out what just happened, but I prefer to watch it later.

I haven't watched Nichijou in weeks, and I need to do some thing irl, so I prefer to make a recover for what just happened 10 minutes ago and forget about it.
